attributes.action: set an example in cleaning up the expenses scandal by removing from office Ed Balls and Yvette Cooper who  nominated three different properties in two years to be their main residence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They fall short of the integrity and commitment needed by a cabinet member of a credible party having a combined household income of some £300,000 from the taxpayer, yet still scrabble around like junior clerks to exploit their over-generous expenses.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
